definitions.definition: A program , especially an audio program, produced on a regular basis , delivered over the Internet in a compressed digital format and designed for playback on computers or portable devices such as mobile phones .
An individual episode of such a program.

main_definition: A program , especially an audio program, produced on a regular basis , delivered over the Internet in a compressed digital format and designed for playback on computers or portable devices such as mobile phones . [from early 21st c.]
secondary_definitions: ( loosely , by extension ) An individual episode of such a program.
